casebody.data:
No. 10-1148. MCI Sales and Service, Inc., fka Hausman Bus Sales, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. James Hinton, Individually and as Representative of the Estate of Dolores Hinton, Deceased, et al. 563 U.S. 1008, 131 S. Ct. 2903,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1246,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3990. May 23, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Supreme Court of Texas denied.

Same case below, 329 S.W.3d 475.
